entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 7:56 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
